the classic Nelson.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: David Zincavage 
  To: token_kenkyu_kai@... ; nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com ; Nihonto 
  Sent: Wednesday, May 04, 2005 6:55 PM
  Subject: book title


  I have a small, old Japanese-language book by Sato Kansan, titled "Nihon Meito 100 ____,"  obviously picturing and discussing 100 important swords.  I can't find that last complex kanji in Nelson.  Does anybody know the last word of the title and the publication date?
